testcase.name: Change country and pay bills
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to "https://www.westernunion.com/".....................passed When User expands the burger menu...........................................passed Then User selects Find Location option......................................passed And User validates that page is redirected to Find Locations page...........passed And User clicks on Agent and fills Agent Name,Postal Code...................passed And User clicks on Open and get list of open agents below...................passed And User prints the first open agent details on the list....................passed
